HR CLERK

SUMMARY

Translates business vision into HR initiatives that improve performance, profitability, growth, and employee engagement.
Developing, improving and managing HR strategies in benefits and compensation, employee recruitment and development, ethics and corporate social responsibility, diversity, safety and security, and business strategy.
Worked with continuous improvement programs in connection to development of Lean and Six Sigma strategy programs.
Highlights
New Employee Orientation Applicant Tracking System Onboarding Payroll Management includes timekeeper for Kronos Timekeeping System Compensation and Benefits
Performance Management
Workers Compensation General Ledger Accounting
Database Management Continuous Improvement Six Sigma Lean Manufacturing Business Strategy

One project included setup up of IT Service provider contract.
HR duties included maintenance of employee records, recruitment, employee orientation and onboarding.

Administrator to three databases (Labor, Skills and MRP Vacation Calendar).
Provides administrative support for Continuous Improvement Program and Safety Programs.

Program provides critical knowledge necessary for those starting out in the HR profession, performing HR duties as a part of a non-HR job, or for those looking for an effective way to boost employee management skills.
Offers critical knowledge necessary to help reduce costs, avoid potential lawsuits, and improve the ability to handle challenging HR issues.

<JD_START>
Job Title: HR & Payroll Full-time Paid Internship with Top Omaha Company

Location: Omaha Metropolitan Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Customer Service, General Business, Human Resources

Description:
HR & Payroll Specialist - PAID Internship Opportunity at Top Omaha Company
We are seeking a highly motivated and talented individual to join a collaborative team as an HR & Payroll Specialist Intern. This is a paid full-time post-grad internship position with potential for hire based on job performance. As an HR & Payroll Specialist Intern, you will work closely with our HR and finance teams to ensure timely and accurate processing of payroll and benefits administration for our employees. This position will offer great exposure to various parts of the HR process.
Responsibilities:Assist with processing payroll and administering employee benefits programsRespond to employee inquiries related to payroll and benefitsCoordinate HR administrative tasks such as maintaining employee files, on-boarding, and off-boardingHelp ensure compliance with federal, state, and local regulations related to payroll and benefitsCollaborate with cross-functional teams to support organizational goals and initiatives
This position would be ideal for someone with high attention to detail who prioritizes excellent communication and customer service skills. Utilize strong analytical skills to problem solve with an excellent team.
This internship provides a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in HR and payroll administration in a supportive team environment. This company values mentorship and growth opportunities, which builds their highly respected reputation.If you are a self-starter with a teamwork attitude and a passion for providing excellent customer service, we encourage you to apply for this exciting new role.
To learn more about this opportunity on a confidential basis call McKenzie Wager at 402.334.4800 *241 or send your resume to mwager@hemphillsearch.com to learn more. Job Number 9150MW
The Right Match - The First Time
Your Confidentiality is Our Priority; Hemphill will NOT Forward Your Resume Without Your Approval.
To see all Hemphill job postings go to www.hemphillsearch.com
Hemphill Voted – “Best Employment Firm” by Omaha’s Business Leaders & B2B Magazine in 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011, 2013, 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022 & 2023!
Omaha Chamber of Commerce Top 25 – “Excellence in Business Award Winner” based upon our growth and commitment to quality.
*** Never a fee to our applicants ***

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
